sentence.Network_cn: 它是一条小猎狗,眼睛亮亮的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French (chien) terrier 'earth (dog'), from medieval Latin terrarius, from Latin terra 'earth'.
late 15th cent.: from Old French terrier, from medieval Latin terrarius (liber) ('book) of land', from Latin terra 'earth'.

entry.def: A terrier is a small breed of dog. There are many different types of terrier.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several usually small short-bodied breeds originally trained to hunt animals living underground
